title: Monk
content: Attack: When a creature misses you with a melee attack, you can spend 1 Ki Point as a reaction to make them attack a new target if possible. Life of the Party: Every time Intoxicating Strike hits, the monk gains Life of the Party, which increases Armour Class and Attack Rolls against Drunk targets. This effect can stack.
